newsitem.title: GERMANY: TENNIS-AGASSI PULLS OUT OF WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP WITH ILLNESS.
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-AGASSI PULLS OUT OF WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP WITH ILLNESS.

text.p: Andre Agassi has decided to pull out of the rest of the ATP world tennis championship because of illness, organisers said on Wednesday.

The American world number seven put up a dismal performance in a 6-2 6-1 defeat by Pete Sampras in his opening match on Wednesday and said he was considering withdrawing because of a stomach upset and influenza.
Later ATP officials said that Agassi had decided not to continue playing and would be replaced by Swede Thomas Enqvist in the rest of the round-robin group matches.
